imdb.plot outline: Two best friends , working together at the Egyptian museum. Farag was rehearsing a new Egyptian local beat that he composed. Taken by the hype beats, he smashed a monument and broke its arm.. When his friend Adel discovered the incident, it was already TOO LATE. They were spelled by a translocation spell, and they travelled in time, to the age of the pharaohs, and upon their arrival a unique adventure begins.
imdb.title: Faragna
plot: A Comedy fantasy series set in Ancient Egypt, 4000 years ago! A magical spell coincide with a silly mistake in the Egyptian museum; taking Adel and Farag back in time to start their unique journey in the land of magic.

Two best friends , working together at the Egyptian museum. Farag was rehearsing a new Egyptian local beat that he composed. Taken by the hype beats, he smashed a monument and broke its arm.. When his friend Adel discovered the incident, it was already TOO LATE. They were spelled by a translocation spell, and they travelled in time, to the age of the pharaohs, and upon their arrival a unique adventure begins.
